notFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

resetPassword.help: Introduce your email, then a link to recover the account will be sent to that same email.
resetPassword.error: An error happened when recovering password!
resetPassword.sended: Check your inbox, we just sent you an email.
resetPassword.help2: Enter the new password and repeat it again to confirm. If the passwords match you will be redirected to login.

logOut.thanks: ¡Gracias por usar nuestros servicios! Esperamos que su experiencia haya sido placentera.

student.title: Create Student Account
student.help: Enter your personal data, then we will send you an email with a link to finish the process.
